allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD='npg_w5lJR8VifOWz' psql -h 'ep-blue-union-adbh5vnk-pooler.c-2.us-east-1.aws.neon.tech' -U 'neondb_owner' -d 'neondb' -c "SELECT card_id, COUNT(*) as snapshot_count FROM marketsnapshot GROUP BY card_id ORDER BY snapshot_count DESC LIMIT 10;")
